modName: Vein skin texture for Navetseas CBBE-UNP skin pack
summary: Adds veins to navetsea\'s CBBE/UNP skin texture pack
descriptionHtml:
Updated UNP original veins saved using ARGB 8* (for people having issues opening the .dds files) 9/05/2012
Updated UNP versions (lighter and original) 7/15/2012
Updated CBBE versions (new readme, removed .ini files) 7/15/2012
Updated Lighter veins added. 7/10/2012
Updated to allow download with NMM. 


As per request of Derrick727 I\'ve made my modification of Navetsea\'s CBBE skin texture pack.

[b][size=6]A few disclaimers/warnings:[/size][/b]

This mod may not be for everyone. This mod was intended for use with the color slider and designed around my ENB settings, I do not recommend using this skin pack with \"dark\" style ENBs or the base game lighting. The veins become overly dark and are intended for use with a lighter style ENB.
Please be mindful of this when using the texture.

While this mod does make good use of the extended slider colors, it does not does not work well with all lore friendly skin tones on the color slider. Darker skin tones show they veins far more than lighter ones, and blue or red skin tone tints can make the veins look black, or cause them to not be visible depending on how dark or light the blue/red is. That being said, most colors on the slider work just fine.

[b][size=6]What does this do?[/size][/b]
This adds light blue veins over all the variants (hair,shaved,strip,clean etc..) in Navetsea\'s skin pack and will allow you to use the muscle mod included with the pack. 

[b][size=6]Requirements:[/size][/b]

[b]CBBE body replacer by Calientes:[/b] 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
OR
[b]Dimon99\'s Dimonized UNP first:[/b] 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
AND
[b]Navetsea\'s CBBE/Thepal/UNP compatible skin pack:[/b] 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554

You MUST download the below from Navetsea\'s mod first:
\"Basvanbeu MuscleTextureChanger female only LITE with NavetseaSkinset for CBBE or UNP set\"
\"CBBE skin texture v1_8 feminine arm toned abs PATCH\"
\"Female Face skin v1_8 rev1 Fuller Lips with makeup PATCH\"
This texture pack overwrites the body,and face files of those downloads but does not included the .msn, .s or .sk files. Follow Navetsea\'s instructions carefully!

[b][size=4]I can\'t stress this enough, you MUST install Navetsea\'s pack first to get the .msn, .s and .sk files as well as the femalehands.dds or this skin pack wont work properly.[/size][/b]


Suggested mods for this skin pack to look the way it does in my screen shots:

Skyrim Enhanced shaders FX ENB: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/822
OR
Imvisio ENB by Matso
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19379

Old version of CBBE veins contains my Skyrim.ini and Skyrimpref.ini for shadow tweaks to help make this skin pack look better.

I also suggest using:
 ENB Customizer: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17400

Extended Slider color: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6923 
This will let you make your skin far more pale.


Possible future additions:
[s]UNP compatible version[/s] Added! 7/15/2012
ARGB 8 versions of UNP light and both CBBE versions
Alternate vein colors, lightness and darkness.


Installation:
1.Install ONE of the below: (not both)

CBBE body replacer by Calientes: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
OR
Dimon99\'s Dimonized UNP: 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

2.Install Navetsea\'s CBBE/Thepal/UNP compatible skin pack: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554

3.Install Light or Dark veins depending on your taste. If using NMM, select \'No\' at the first promt.

Files this pack overwrites:
femalebody_1.dds
femalebody_2.dds
femalebody_3.dds
femalebody_4.dds
femalebody_5.dds
femalebody_6.dds
femalebody_7.dds
femalebody_8.dds
femalebody_9.dds
femalebody_10.dds
femalebody_11.dds
femalehead.dds



To Uninstall:
install any CBBE/UNP texture pack. (recommended)

Comments/critiques and suggestions appreciated!

Enjoy,
Mirror
author: Mirror
